title: Grid creation software
content:
Is there software out there that I can use to quickly create grids with units equal to whole numbers so that baselines will all align with the grid? An Indesign plugin for Mac would be ideal.

 [‹ Examples of Serifa?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208142138/http:/typophile.com/node/31962 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help needed - Perla ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208142138/http:/typophile.com/node/39738 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett

comments.content: You can customize your doc grid, baseline grid, and margins/guides anyway you like. Maybe I don’t get the question.
I don’t want to avoid setting up the grid, I want to avoid crunching the numbers involved in making sure that my grid has units and margins divisible by the leading.
